Nodes.Speaker: Spellbook
Nodes.Text: Which spell would you like to cast?

Nodes.Speaker: Spellbook
Nodes.Text: Awaken (A): Wakes a sleeping party member. Reagents: Ginseng, Garlic.

Nodes.Speaker: Spellbook
Nodes.Text: Blink (B): Teleports the party a short distance on the map. Reagents: Sulfurous Ash, Blood Moss.

Nodes.Speaker: Spellbook
Nodes.Text: Cure (C): Cures poison. Reagents: Ginseng, Garlic.

Nodes.Speaker: Spellbook
Nodes.Text: Dispel (D): Dispels enemy summoned creatures. Reagents: Garlic, Sulfurous Ash.

Nodes.Speaker: Spellbook
Nodes.Text: Energy (E): Creates a barrier (energy field). Reagents: Sulfurous Ash, Spider Silk.

Nodes.Speaker: Spellbook
Nodes.Text: Fireball (F): Attacks one enemy with fire. Reagents: Sulfurous Ash, Black Pearl.

Nodes.Speaker: Spellbook
Nodes.Text: Gate Travel (G): Teleports the party to a moongate location. Reagents: Mandrake Root, Black Pearl.

Nodes.Speaker: Spellbook
Nodes.Text: Heal (H): Restores some HP to one character. Reagents: Ginseng.

Nodes.Speaker: Spellbook
Nodes.Text: Iceball (I): Attacks one enemy with ice. Reagents: Sulfurous Ash, Black Pearl.

Nodes.Speaker: Spellbook
Nodes.Text: Jinx (J): Confuses enemies (low success rate). Reagents: Nightshade.

Nodes.Speaker: Spellbook
Nodes.Text: Kill (K): Attempts to instantly kill an enemy. Reagents: Nightshade, Mandrake Root.

Nodes.Speaker: Spellbook
Nodes.Text: Light (L): Lights up dungeon or dark areas. Reagents: Sulfurous Ash.

Nodes.Speaker: Spellbook
Nodes.Text: Magic Missile (M): Basic magical attack. Reagents: Sulfurous Ash, Black Pearl.

Nodes.Speaker: Spellbook
Nodes.Text: Negate (N): Cancels enemy spell effects. Reagents: Garlic, Sulfurous Ash.

Nodes.Speaker: Spellbook
Nodes.Text: Open (O): Unlocks chests (may fail on trapped ones). Reagents: Sulfurous Ash.

Nodes.Speaker: Spellbook
Nodes.Text: Protect (P): Increases party’s defense temporarily. Reagents: Garlic, Spider Silk.

Nodes.Speaker: Spellbook
Nodes.Text: Quickness (Q): Speeds up party in combat. Reagents: Blood Moss, Spider Silk.

Nodes.Speaker: Spellbook
Nodes.Text: Resurrection (R): Revives a dead character. Reagents: Ginseng, Garlic, Mandrake Root.

Nodes.Speaker: Spellbook
Nodes.Text: Sleep (S): Attempts to put enemies to sleep. Reagents: Ginseng, Spider Silk.

Nodes.Speaker: Spellbook
Nodes.Text: Tremor (T): Damages all enemies (earthquake). Reagents: Sulfurous Ash, Blood Moss, Mandrake Root.

Nodes.Speaker: Spellbook
Nodes.Text: Undead (U): Damages undead creatures. Reagents: Garlic, Sulfurous Ash.

Nodes.Speaker: Spellbook
Nodes.Text: View (V): Displays a bird’s-eye view of the overworld. Reagents: Nightshade, Blood Moss.

Nodes.Speaker: Spellbook
Nodes.Text: Wind (W): Changes the direction of the wind (for sailing). Reagents: Blood Moss.

Nodes.Speaker: Spellbook
Nodes.Text: X-it (X): Exits dungeons, shrines, or combat. Reagents: Mandrake Root, Blood Moss.

Nodes.Speaker: Spellbook
Nodes.Text: Y-up (Y): Elevates party one level in dungeon. Reagents: Blood Moss, Mandrake Root.

Nodes.Speaker: Spellbook
Nodes.Text: Z-down (Z): Lowers party one level in dungeon. Reagents: Nightshade, Mandrake Root.
